amendment.description: To provide middle class tax relief.

action.text: Amendment SA 1846 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1846 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 65. Record Vote Number: 299.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 4105 of H.Con.Res. 71,115th Congress, raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1846.
Amendment SA 1846 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 1618. (consideration: CR S7704-7706; text: CR S7704-7705) To provide middle class tax relief.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1846 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 65. Record Vote Number: 299.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1846 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 1618.
